caption: Albrecht Dürer (1471–1528; born and died Nuremberg, Germany; active Venice, Italy, and Nuremburg), Virgin and Child on a Crescent, 1514. Engraving on laid paper (Bartsch 33); 11.7 x 7.3 cm (plate). Gift of Dorothy Burr Thompson and Homer A. Thompson (x1991-104)
